page.title: 10LAKE CENTRE SHOW GROUP
page.content: The Lake Centre is a small white hut on the Warwick Estate named,like the local roads,after lakes in the Lake District.It is used for things such as a youth club and children's discos. On a Tuesday,Wednesday and Thursday a man called Gary Wilson,his wife Dee and two other members of his family are organising a show to be performed by children of all ages.The show is to {raise money for the Bradford City fire {disaster fund.}Our group,the Warwick Children's Variety Show Group,is performing shows based on pop music. We are impersonating people like Madonna,Black Lace,Toni Basil and many other pop stars. The first show is on July 23rd. at the Old Peoples Home at the other end of our estate.
